google_play_reviews.content: Only partially works in android tv. Want to be able to select the keys using d pad like the standard aosp keyboard. I'm using Rii mx8 air mouse. Android tv 9 rooted. I can select keys using mouse only but no d pad. Everything else works though.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Dpad is coming soon. You can join the discord server for updates (and test new features) at http://bit.ly/kmsupport
Thank you for your review! I'm glad you enjoy the app.

google_play_reviews.userName: jungwon jungwon jungwon jungwon jungwon jungwon
google_play_reviews.content: Is there any way to use my phone's own keyboard? This one is kind of hard to use
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, this is the only proper keyboard supported by Key Mapper 2.1+. There are a lot of settings to tweak the behaviour of the keyboard.

google_play_reviews.content: Nice but please hurry up and update key mapper to use this app
google_play_reviews.replyContent: You can sign up for the Key Mapper beta and it will work! üòÅ
